page.title: 14AGED IN DENBIGH.
page.content: With advances in medical care many people are enjoying a greater life span.Oldage does present problems and the people of Denbigh are helped by a number of voluntary organisations e.g. {meals on wheels,W.R.V.S. }as well as having a day centre at Eirianfa. The public sector has provided accomodation for the more needy at Dolwen old peoples home and sheltered housing at Cysgodfa.{Private nursing and rest homes have increased recently and there is concern that some might be exploiting the aged. At Wynne's Park,a private establishment,residents are provided with their "own" self-contained bungalow.Qualified nursing staff are permanently in attendance.Residents therefore maintain a sense of independence and dignity.
